unAggregate :: Aggregate -> Int64

Buy :: Side

unTradeId :: TradeId -> Word64

Done :: OrderStatus

module Coinbase.Exchange.Types.MarketData
data Product
Product :: ProductId -> CurrencyId -> CurrencyId -> Scientific -> Scientific -> Scientific -> Text -> Product
prodId :: Product -> ProductId
prodBaseCurrency :: Product -> CurrencyId
prodQuoteCurrency :: Product -> CurrencyId
prodBaseMinSize :: Product -> Scientific
prodBaseMaxSize :: Product -> Scientific
prodQuoteIncrement :: Product -> Scientific
prodDisplayName :: Product -> Text
data Book a
Book :: Word64 -> [Bid a] -> [Ask a] -> Book a
bookSequence :: Book a -> Word64
bookBids :: Book a -> [Bid a]
bookAsks :: Book a -> [Ask a]
data Ask a
Ask :: Price -> Size -> a -> Ask a
data Bid a
Bid :: Price -> Size -> a -> Bid a
data Tick
Tick :: Word64 -> Price -> Size -> Maybe UTCTime -> Tick
tickTradeId :: Tick -> Word64
tickPrice :: Tick -> Price
tickSize :: Tick -> Size
tickTime :: Tick -> Maybe UTCTime
data Trade
Trade :: UTCTime -> TradeId -> Price -> Size -> Side -> Trade
tradeTime :: Trade -> UTCTime
tradeTradeId :: Trade -> TradeId
tradePrice :: Trade -> Price
tradeSize :: Trade -> Size
tradeSide :: Trade -> Side
data Candle
Candle :: UTCTime -> Low -> High -> Open -> Close -> Volume -> Candle
newtype Low
Low :: Double -> Low
unLow :: Low -> Double
newtype High
High :: Double -> High
unHigh :: High -> Double
newtype Open
Open :: Double -> Open
unOpen :: Open -> Double
newtype Close
Close :: Double -> Close
unClose :: Close -> Double
newtype Volume
Volume :: Double -> Volume
unVolume :: Volume -> Double
data Stats
Stats :: Open -> High -> Low -> Volume -> Stats
statsOpen :: Stats -> Open
statsHigh :: Stats -> High
statsLow :: Stats -> Low
statsVolume :: Stats -> Volume
data Currency
Currency :: CurrencyId -> Text -> CoinScientific -> Currency
curId :: Currency -> CurrencyId
curName :: Currency -> Text
curMinSize :: Currency -> CoinScientific
data ExchangeTime
ExchangeTime :: UTCTime -> Double -> ExchangeTime
timeIso :: ExchangeTime -> UTCTime
timeEpoch :: ExchangeTime -> Double

module Coinbase.Exchange.Types
data ApiType
Sandbox :: ApiType
Live :: ApiType
type Endpoint = String
type Path = String
website :: Endpoint
sandboxRest :: Endpoint
sandboxSocket :: Endpoint
liveRest :: Endpoint
liveSocket :: Endpoint
type Key = ByteString
type Secret = ByteString
type Passphrase = ByteString
data Token
key :: Token -> ByteString
secret :: Token -> ByteString
passphrase :: Token -> ByteString
mkToken :: Key -> Secret -> Passphrase -> Either String Token
data ExchangeConf
ExchangeConf :: Manager -> Maybe Token -> ApiType -> ExchangeConf
manager :: ExchangeConf -> Manager
authToken :: ExchangeConf -> Maybe Token
apiType :: ExchangeConf -> ApiType
data ExchangeFailure
ParseFailure :: Text -> ExchangeFailure
ApiFailure :: Text -> ExchangeFailure
AuthenticationRequiredFailure :: Text -> ExchangeFailure
AuthenticationRequiresByteStrings :: ExchangeFailure
type Exchange a = ExchangeT IO a

-- | A monad transformer that adds exceptions to other monads.
--   
--   <tt>ExceptT</tt> constructs a monad parameterized over two things:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li>e - The exception type.</li>
--   <li>m - The inner monad.</li>
--   </ul>
--   
--   The <a>return</a> function yields a computation that produces the
--   given value, while <tt>&gt;&gt;=</tt> sequences two subcomputations,
--   exiting on the first exception.
data ExceptT e (m :: * -> *) a :: * -> (* -> *) -> * -> *
runExchange :: ExchangeConf -> Exchange a -> IO (Either ExchangeFailure a)
runExchangeT :: MonadBaseControl IO m => ExchangeConf -> ExchangeT m a -> m (Either ExchangeFailure a)
getManager :: MonadReader ExchangeConf m => m Manager
instance (Monad m, MonadThrow m, MonadIO m, MonadBase IO m) => MonadResource (ExchangeT m)
instance MonadBase IO m => MonadBase IO (ExchangeT m)
instance Show ApiType
instance Show ExchangeFailure
instance Functor m => Functor (ExchangeT m)
instance (Monad m, Functor m) => Applicative (ExchangeT m)
instance Monad m => Monad (ExchangeT m)
instance MonadIO m => MonadIO (ExchangeT m)
instance MonadThrow m => MonadThrow (ExchangeT m)
instance Monad m => MonadError ExchangeFailure (ExchangeT m)
instance Monad m => MonadReader ExchangeConf (ExchangeT m)

module Coinbase.Exchange.Types.Private
newtype AccountId
AccountId :: UUID -> AccountId
unAccountId :: AccountId -> UUID
data Account
Account :: AccountId -> CoinScientific -> CoinScientific -> CoinScientific -> CurrencyId -> Account
accId :: Account -> AccountId
accBalance :: Account -> CoinScientific
accHold :: Account -> CoinScientific
accAvailable :: Account -> CoinScientific
accCurrency :: Account -> CurrencyId
newtype EntryId
EntryId :: Word64 -> EntryId
unEntryId :: EntryId -> Word64
data Entry
Entry :: EntryId -> UTCTime -> CoinScientific -> CoinScientific -> EntryType -> EntryDetails -> Entry
entryId :: Entry -> EntryId
entryCreatedAt :: Entry -> UTCTime
entryAmount :: Entry -> CoinScientific
entryBalance :: Entry -> CoinScientific
entryType :: Entry -> EntryType
entryDetails :: Entry -> EntryDetails
data EntryType
Match :: EntryType
Fee :: EntryType
Transfer :: EntryType
data EntryDetails
EntryDetails :: Maybe OrderId -> Maybe TradeId -> Maybe ProductId -> EntryDetails
detailOrderId :: EntryDetails -> Maybe OrderId
detailTradeId :: EntryDetails -> Maybe TradeId
detailProductId :: EntryDetails -> Maybe ProductId
newtype HoldId
HoldId :: UUID -> HoldId
unHoldId :: HoldId -> UUID
data Hold
OrderHold :: HoldId -> AccountId -> UTCTime -> UTCTime -> CoinScientific -> OrderId -> Hold
holdId :: Hold -> HoldId
holdAccountId :: Hold -> AccountId
holdCreatedAt :: Hold -> UTCTime
holdUpdatedAt :: Hold -> UTCTime
holdAmount :: Hold -> CoinScientific
holdOrderRef :: Hold -> OrderId
TransferHold :: HoldId -> AccountId -> UTCTime -> UTCTime -> CoinScientific -> TransferId -> Hold
holdId :: Hold -> HoldId
holdAccountId :: Hold -> AccountId
holdCreatedAt :: Hold -> UTCTime
holdUpdatedAt :: Hold -> UTCTime
holdAmount :: Hold -> CoinScientific
holdTransferRef :: Hold -> TransferId
data SelfTrade
DecrementAndCancel :: SelfTrade
CancelOldest :: SelfTrade
CancelNewest :: SelfTrade
CancelBoth :: SelfTrade
data NewOrder
NewOrder :: Size -> Price -> Side -> ProductId -> Maybe ClientOrderId -> Maybe SelfTrade -> NewOrder
noSize :: NewOrder -> Size
noPrice :: NewOrder -> Price
noSide :: NewOrder -> Side
noProductId :: NewOrder -> ProductId
noClientOid :: NewOrder -> Maybe ClientOrderId
noSelfTrade :: NewOrder -> Maybe SelfTrade
data OrderConfirmation
OrderConfirmation :: OrderId -> OrderConfirmation
ocId :: OrderConfirmation -> OrderId
data Order
Order :: OrderId -> Size -> Price -> ProductId -> OrderStatus -> Maybe Size -> Maybe Price -> Bool -> Side -> UTCTime -> Maybe UTCTime -> Maybe Reason -> Order
orderId :: Order -> OrderId
orderSize :: Order -> Size
orderPrice :: Order -> Price
orderProductId :: Order -> ProductId
orderStatus :: Order -> OrderStatus
orderFilledSize :: Order -> Maybe Size
orderFilledFees :: Order -> Maybe Price
orderSettled :: Order -> Bool
orderSide :: Order -> Side
orderCreatedAt :: Order -> UTCTime
orderDoneAt :: Order -> Maybe UTCTime
orderDoneReason :: Order -> Maybe Reason
data Liquidity
Maker :: Liquidity
Taker :: Liquidity
data Fill
Fill :: TradeId -> ProductId -> Price -> Size -> OrderId -> UTCTime -> Liquidity -> Price -> Bool -> Side -> Fill
fillTradeId :: Fill -> TradeId
fillProductId :: Fill -> ProductId
fillPrice :: Fill -> Price
fillSize :: Fill -> Size
fillOrderId :: Fill -> OrderId
fillCreatedAt :: Fill -> UTCTime
fillLiquidity :: Fill -> Liquidity
fillFee :: Fill -> Price
fillSettled :: Fill -> Bool
fillSide :: Fill -> Side
newtype TransferId
TransferId :: UUID -> TransferId
unTransferId :: TransferId -> UUID
newtype CoinbaseAccountId
CoinbaseAccountId :: UUID -> CoinbaseAccountId
unCoinbaseAccountId :: CoinbaseAccountId -> UUID
data Transfer
Deposit :: Size -> CoinbaseAccountId -> Transfer
transAmount :: Transfer -> Size
transCoinbaseAccount :: Transfer -> CoinbaseAccountId
Withdraw :: Size -> CoinbaseAccountId -> Transfer
transAmount :: Transfer -> Size
transCoinbaseAccount :: Transfer -> CoinbaseAccountId

instance Constructor C1_0EntryId
instance Selector S1_0_0EntryId
instance Datatype D1EntryType
instance Constructor C1_0EntryType
instance Constructor C1_1EntryType
instance Constructor C1_2EntryType
instance Datatype D1EntryDetails
instance Constructor C1_0EntryDetails
instance Selector S1_0_0EntryDetails
instance Selector S1_0_1EntryDetails
instance Selector S1_0_2EntryDetails
instance Datatype D1Entry
instance Constructor C1_0Entry
instance Selector S1_0_0Entry
instance Selector S1_0_1Entry
instance Selector S1_0_2Entry
instance Selector S1_0_3Entry
instance Selector S1_0_4Entry
instance Selector S1_0_5Entry
instance Datatype D1HoldId
instance Constructor C1_0HoldId
instance Selector S1_0_0HoldId
instance Datatype D1SelfTrade
instance Constructor C1_0SelfTrade
instance Constructor C1_1SelfTrade
instance Constructor C1_2SelfTrade
instance Constructor C1_3SelfTrade
instance Datatype D1NewOrder
instance Constructor C1_0NewOrder
instance Selector S1_0_0NewOrder
instance Selector S1_0_1NewOrder
instance Selector S1_0_2NewOrder
instance Selector S1_0_3NewOrder
instance Selector S1_0_4NewOrder
instance Selector S1_0_5NewOrder
instance Datatype D1OrderConfirmation
instance Constructor C1_0OrderConfirmation
instance Selector S1_0_0OrderConfirmation
instance Datatype D1Order
instance Constructor C1_0Order
instance Selector S1_0_0Order
instance Selector S1_0_1Order
instance Selector S1_0_2Order
instance Selector S1_0_3Order
instance Selector S1_0_4Order
instance Selector S1_0_5Order
instance Selector S1_0_6Order
instance Selector S1_0_7Order
instance Selector S1_0_8Order
instance Selector S1_0_9Order
instance Selector S1_0_10Order
instance Selector S1_0_11Order
instance Datatype D1Liquidity
instance Constructor C1_0Liquidity
instance Constructor C1_1Liquidity
instance Datatype D1Fill
instance Constructor C1_0Fill
instance Selector S1_0_0Fill
instance Selector S1_0_1Fill
instance Selector S1_0_2Fill
instance Selector S1_0_3Fill
instance Selector S1_0_4Fill
instance Selector S1_0_5Fill
instance Selector S1_0_6Fill
instance Selector S1_0_7Fill
instance Selector S1_0_8Fill
instance Selector S1_0_9Fill
instance Datatype D1TransferId
instance Constructor C1_0TransferId
instance Selector S1_0_0TransferId
instance Datatype D1Hold
instance Constructor C1_0Hold
instance Constructor C1_1Hold
instance Selector S1_0_0Hold
instance Selector S1_0_1Hold
instance Selector S1_0_2Hold
instance Selector S1_0_3Hold
instance Selector S1_0_4Hold
instance Selector S1_0_5Hold
instance Selector S1_1_0Hold
instance Selector S1_1_1Hold
instance Selector S1_1_2Hold
instance Selector S1_1_3Hold
instance Selector S1_1_4Hold
instance Selector S1_1_5Hold
instance Datatype D1CoinbaseAccountId
instance Constructor C1_0CoinbaseAccountId
instance Selector S1_0_0CoinbaseAccountId
instance Datatype D1Transfer
instance Constructor C1_0Transfer
instance Constructor C1_1Transfer
instance Selector S1_0_0Transfer
instance Selector S1_0_1Transfer
instance Selector S1_1_0Transfer
instance Selector S1_1_1Transfer
instance FromJSON Transfer
instance ToJSON Transfer
instance NFData Transfer
instance FromJSON Fill
instance ToJSON Fill
instance NFData Fill
instance FromJSON Liquidity
instance ToJSON Liquidity
instance Hashable Liquidity
instance NFData Liquidity
instance FromJSON Order
instance ToJSON Order
instance NFData Order
instance FromJSON OrderConfirmation
instance ToJSON OrderConfirmation
instance NFData OrderConfirmation
instance FromJSON NewOrder
instance ToJSON NewOrder
instance NFData NewOrder
instance FromJSON SelfTrade
instance ToJSON SelfTrade
instance Hashable SelfTrade
instance NFData SelfTrade
instance FromJSON Hold
instance ToJSON Hold
instance NFData Hold
instance FromJSON EntryDetails
instance ToJSON EntryDetails
instance NFData EntryDetails
instance FromJSON EntryType
instance ToJSON EntryType
instance Hashable EntryType
instance NFData EntryType
instance FromJSON Entry
instance ToJSON Entry
instance NFData Entry
instance FromJSON Account
instance ToJSON Account
instance NFData Account

module Coinbase.Exchange.Private
getAccountList :: (MonadResource m, MonadReader ExchangeConf m, MonadError ExchangeFailure m) => m [Account]
getAccount :: (MonadResource m, MonadReader ExchangeConf m, MonadError ExchangeFailure m) => AccountId -> m Account
getAccountLedger :: (MonadResource m, MonadReader ExchangeConf m, MonadError ExchangeFailure m) => AccountId -> m [Entry]
getAccountHolds :: (MonadResource m, MonadReader ExchangeConf m, MonadError ExchangeFailure m) => AccountId -> m [Hold]
createOrder :: (MonadResource m, MonadReader ExchangeConf m, MonadError ExchangeFailure m) => NewOrder -> m OrderId
cancelOrder :: (MonadResource m, MonadReader ExchangeConf m, MonadError ExchangeFailure m) => OrderId -> m ()
getOrderList :: (MonadResource m, MonadReader ExchangeConf m, MonadError ExchangeFailure m) => [OrderStatus] -> m [Order]
getOrder :: (MonadResource m, MonadReader ExchangeConf m, MonadError ExchangeFailure m) => OrderId -> m Order
getFills :: (MonadResource m, MonadReader ExchangeConf m, MonadError ExchangeFailure m) => Maybe OrderId -> Maybe ProductId -> m [Fill]
createTransfer :: (MonadResource m, MonadReader ExchangeConf m, MonadError ExchangeFailure m) => Transfer -> m ()

module Coinbase.Exchange.Socket
subscribe :: ApiType -> ProductId -> ClientApp () -> IO ()

module Coinbase.Exchange.MarketData
getProducts :: (MonadResource m, MonadReader ExchangeConf m, MonadError ExchangeFailure m) => m [Product]
getTopOfBook :: (MonadResource m, MonadReader ExchangeConf m, MonadError ExchangeFailure m) => ProductId -> m (Book Aggregate)
getTop50OfBook :: (MonadResource m, MonadReader ExchangeConf m, MonadError ExchangeFailure m) => ProductId -> m (Book Aggregate)
getOrderBook :: (MonadResource m, MonadReader ExchangeConf m, MonadError ExchangeFailure m) => ProductId -> m (Book OrderId)
getProductTicker :: (MonadResource m, MonadReader ExchangeConf m, MonadError ExchangeFailure m) => ProductId -> m Tick

-- | Currently Broken: coinbase api doesn't return valid ISO 8601 dates for
--   this route.
getTrades :: (MonadResource m, MonadReader ExchangeConf m, MonadError ExchangeFailure m) => ProductId -> m [Trade]
getHistory :: (MonadResource m, MonadReader ExchangeConf m, MonadError ExchangeFailure m) => ProductId -> Maybe StartTime -> Maybe EndTime -> Maybe Scale -> m [Candle]
getStats :: (MonadResource m, MonadReader ExchangeConf m, MonadError ExchangeFailure m) => ProductId -> m Stats
getCurrencies :: (MonadResource m, MonadReader ExchangeConf m, MonadError ExchangeFailure m) => m [Currency]
getExchangeTime :: (MonadResource m, MonadReader ExchangeConf m, MonadError ExchangeFailure m) => m ExchangeTime
